div.a: How Airport Security Is Killing Us

div.div: These days, the TSA’s major role appears to be to make plane trips more unpleasant. And by doing so, it’s encouraging people to take the considerably more dangerous option of traveling by road.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SGs7Op&via=Digg&text=How Airport Security Is Killing Us

div.div: HE NEEDS A TWITTER ACCOUNT STAT

div.a: John McAfee Is Blogging While Hiding From Police

div.div: John McAfee, the man responsible for the anti-virus software on your computer and currently a murder suspect, has started to blog about life on the run.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UONYti&via=Digg&text=John McAfee Is Blogging While Hiding From Police

div.a: Behind Nintendo's Development Of The Wii U

div.div: The three-year development process of the Wii U offers a glimpse into how the Japanese videogame manufacturer comes up with its new consoles.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PZxFXE&via=Digg&text=Behind Nintendo's Development Of The Wii U

div.a: How Two Guys Turned 'Grand Theft Auto' Into A Cultural Phenomenon

div.div: Dan Houser and his brother Sam are responsible for some of the most fascinating (and controversial) video games ever.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xpiw6i&via=Digg&text=How Two Guys Turned 'Grand Theft Auto' Into A Cultural Phenomenon

div.a: Einstein's Brain More Special Than We Ever Knew

div.div: Ever since his death in 1955, scientists have asked what features of Einstein’s brain contributed to his extraordinary insights into physical laws.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TNIESl&via=Digg&text=Einstein's Brain More Special Than We Ever Knew

div.a: GOP Deletes Its Own Progressive Patent Reform Report

div.div: A remarkably bold policy report calling for radical changes to the patent system has been deleted from a Republican Congressional website, just 24 hours after it was released.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SWHa7b&via=Digg&text=GOP Deletes Its Own Progressive Patent Reform Report

div.a: What's The Coolest Place In The Universe

div.div: The coldest place known is inside the Boomerang Nebula. It is in the constellation of Centaurus, 5000 light-years from Earth.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/FQBpDO&via=Digg&text=What's The Coolest Place In The Universe

div.div: GEEK SQUAD DOES NOT WIN ELECTIONS

div.a: Romney Campaign Got Its IT From Best Buy, Staples And Friends

div.div: MindShift Technologies and small firms handled most of campaign's internal tech.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XpthWl&via=Digg&text=Romney Campaign Got Its IT From Best Buy, Staples And Friends

div.div: A FIRE TORNADO THAT KILLED 38,000 PEOPLE

div.a: 6 Baffling Modern-Day Disasters Of Biblical Proportions

div.div: The disasters that happened in the Bible tended to be pretty weird -- you knew it wasn't just a regular storm when the clouds dropped frogs and the seas turned to blood. That's the kind of stuff that just never happens anymore. Well, almost never.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T9yCfY&via=Digg&text=6 Baffling Modern-Day Disasters Of Biblical Proportions

div.a: A Startup You've Never Heard Of Called Supercell Is Suddenly Worth $600 Million

div.div: The 60-person gaming company is rolling in revenue, so much so that it makes many Silicon Valley app companies "look like a humble paper route."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S4XRyq&via=Digg&text=A Startup You've Never Heard Of Called Supercell Is Suddenly Worth $600 Million

div.a: Steve Jobs' Yacht Gives Insights Into His Design Process

div.div: Jobs and noted designer Philippe Starck spent five years working out the details of the super yacht Venus.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SWySMD&via=Digg&text=Steve Jobs' Yacht Gives Insights Into His Design Process

div.a: ATM Gives Out Free Cash, People Form Orderly Line

div.div: Dozens of people have been queuing to withdraw money after a bank machine began dispensing extra cash.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S4VyLV&via=Digg&text=ATM Gives Out Free Cash, People Form Orderly Line

div.div: TAKES ABOUT THREE AND A HALF HOURS

div.a: Watch The Longest Word In English Pronounced

div.div: The official name for the protein titin is technically the longest word in English.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U8EjeH&via=Digg&text=Watch The Longest Word In English Pronounced

div.a: How The Associated Press Verifies User-Generated Content From Sandy To Syria

div.div: A look at how the AP sifts through the deluge of UGC produced by events like Hurricane Sandy and verifies what is real and what is fake.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SR8Vy3&via=Digg&text=How The Associated Press Verifies User-Generated Content From Sandy To Syria

div.a: Is The Wii U A Must-Buy?

div.div: Nintendo's new console is an anomaly in the game console ecosystem, but not for Nintendo.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SVqPQe&via=Digg&text=Is The Wii U A Must-Buy?

div.div: Quick reminder: The difference between liquidation and extinction is like the difference between a fire sale and an actual fire

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/1074cwZ&via=Digg&text=The Twinkie Is Not Extinct

div.a: How A Toothbrush Explains The Power Of Swedish Design

div.div: Although Japan and Sweden are 8,613 kilometers apart and their people are as ethnically divergent as is possible within the planet’s boundaries, the two countries share a remarkably similar aesthetic.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XS35CJ&via=Digg&text=How A Toothbrush Explains The Power Of Swedish Design

div.a: Android 4.2 Is Missing A Very Important Feature: December

div.div: Android 4.2 Still-Jelly Bean is pretty sweet. You've got your Photo Sphere Camera, you've got your Gesture Keyboard. But there's one thing you might notice is missing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WlJB92&via=Digg&text=Android 4.2 Is Missing A Very Important Feature: December

div.a: Dolphins Found Shot, Slashed, Stabbed With Tool

div.div: Authorities are investigating several attacks on dolphins in the northern Gulf of Mexico after some were found with gunshot wounds, cuts and missing jaws.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S28HGS&via=Digg&text=Dolphins Found Shot, Slashed, Stabbed With Tool

div.a: Meat Shot Glasses For Bacon-Flavored Vodka Shots

div.div: These cups of ground beef can be used to consume melted cheese, bacon-flavored vodka, “enhanced” barbecue sauce, and pretty much anything else you’d want to eat with bite-sized quantities of meat.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T3jwq5&via=Digg&text=Meat Shot Glasses For Bacon-Flavored Vodka Shots

div.a: British Airways Leaves Up Ridiculously Offensive Retweet For More Than An Hour

div.div: Sometimes when people send me an abusive, ignorant tweet, I retweet it. Because, well, it seems somehow the right thing to do to make them feel better. However, I am not Britain's flagship airline, with customers whose sensibilities are touchy at best.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SUYsBy&via=Digg&text=British Airways Leaves Up Ridiculously Offensive Retweet For More Than An Hour

div.div: NOT EVERYBODY CAN MAKE AN ANGRY BIRDS

div.a: As Boom Lures App Creators, Tough Part Is Making A Living

div.div: Despite the rumors of hordes of hip programmers starting million-dollar businesses from their kitchen tables, only a small minority of developers actually make a living by creating their own apps.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S1M0Tm&via=Digg&text=As Boom Lures App Creators, Tough Part Is Making A Living

div.a: The Camera Versus The Human Eye

div.div: Basically in doing all this research about how the human eye is like a camera, what I really learned is how human vision is not like a photograph

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S6AoNj&via=Digg&text=The Camera Versus The Human Eye

div.div: SO EASY A PRIME MINISTER CAN DO IT

div.a: How Psy Taught Me Gangnam Style

div.div: Korean pop star Psy invented 'Gangnam style' to mock the pretensions of Seoul's wealthy citizens. Since then, thanks to 700m YouTube hits, David Cameron, Barack Obama and Ban Ki-moon have learned the moves. But who is he, and can he teach Jay Rayner? Eh, sexy lady...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QlMdST&via=Digg&text=How Psy Taught Me Gangnam Style
